headline.main: RAID ON JAPAN SOON SEEN BY PATTERSON; 'It's Coming,' He Says, on Brief Melbourne Visit -- Confers With Premier Curtin

lead_paragraph: MELBOURNE, Australia, Sept. 1 (U.P.) -- Robert P. Patterson, United States Under-Secretary of War, said today that new bombings of Japan were coming and he predicted "more surprises before long" in the Pacific.
snippet: MELBOURNE, Australia, Sept. 1 (U.P.) -- Robert P. Patterson, United States Under-Secretary of War, said today that new bombings of Japan were coming and he predicted "more surprises before long" in the Pacific....
